mods.note: D BRITISH CONSULATE MUSCAT FILS NO: 11/24 NAME OP PILE: WHO f S WHOKarin lakhsh eon of Ha.ii Nawab Khan Bnladi o f Piehin. Correenondence through Loxonal. his country 11 yeart' iuco - returns occasionally as Iranian troops are not sufficient to effect his capture - ootains sone revenue from family estate - father has purchased land near Mirpur Khas - brother said to be dis tractly mad and lives in Iranian Mekran- related to Rustam Khan and Mehrab Khan. His father Haji Uawab having married a Kitchki. V2 - educat ed in Karachi (indifferently) - married - middle height - light complexion - small and black moustache - wears longish hair. General appearance high class Persian.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a list of individuals resident in Gwadur alleged by the British authorities to be 'bad characters and disturbers of the peace'. The list is divided into two sections, 'Hindus' and 'Aga Khanis' [Isma'ilis], and contains entries for a total of twelve individuals.
